name: OpenR1-Math-220k
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A dataset of 220,000 math problems with verified reasoning traces generated by DeepSeek R1.
notes: The dataset includes two to four reasoning traces per problem, verified using Math Verify and Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct for accuracy. It's part of Hugging Face's initiative to replicate DeepSeek R1 and enhance mathematical reasoning in AI models.
